title: Raven
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| raven b [![Raven.png](/images/6/66/Raven.png)](/File:Raven.png) |                                                                                                                                   |
| --------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | An opportunistic scavenger bird that is quite proactive in the production of carrion. It has a particularly unhealthy fascination with eyeballs and things resembling eyeballs, such as pickled onions, walnuts and olives.***“The Hatter opened his eyes very wide on hearing this; but all he said was ‘Why is a raven like a writing-desk?’” -Lewis Carroll, Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland |

## Useful Info

**Ravens** are fast, flying pests that deal relatively low damage. They are occasionally a welcome sight, as they sometimes spawn in a small [vault](/Vault "Vault") that contains a few pieces of shiny [jewellery](/Jewellery "Jewellery") they've collected, but they also appear as an accompaniment to various [tengu](/List_of_tengu "List of tengu") or in defense of a [shambling mangrove](/Shambling_mangrove "Shambling mangrove").

## Tips & Tricks

- Ravens are generally less dangerous than the monsters they accompany, but don't let that fool you into thinking they're harmless -- lightly armored characters in particular should watch out for them.
- Try to limit how much of the flock can reach you at one time by retreating to a chokepoint. Area-of-effect spells like [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball") or the cloud spells can help take them down more swiftly.

## History

Ravens were removed in [0.17](/0.17 "0.17").
html:
Raven

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
raven b 
HP 25-42
HD 6
XP 262
Speed 20
AC 1
EV 10
Will 20
Attack1 14 (peck: plain)
Attack2 11 (claw: plain)


Resistances rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Tiny
Type raven, raven
Flags Flying
See invisible
Warm-blooded
An opportunistic scavenger bird that is quite proactive in the production of carrion. It has a particularly unhealthy fascination with eyeballs and things resembling eyeballs, such as pickled onions, walnuts and olives.

“The Hatter opened his eyes very wide on hearing this; but all he said was ‘Why is a raven like a writing-desk?’”
-Lewis Carroll, Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland

Useful Info

Ravens are fast, flying pests that deal relatively low damage. They are occasionally a welcome sight, as they sometimes spawn in a small vault that contains a few pieces of shiny jewellery they've collected, but they also appear as an accompaniment to various tengu or in defense of a shambling mangrove.

Tips & Tricks

  • Ravens are generally less dangerous than the monsters they accompany, but don't let that fool you into thinking they're harmless -- lightly armored characters in particular should watch out for them.
  • Try to limit how much of the flock can reach you at one time by retreating to a chokepoint. Area-of-effect spells like Fireball or the cloud spells can help take them down more swiftly.

History

Ravens were removed in 0.17.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Raven&oldid=39583"
